user.name: Pratham Raj
user.bio: Building the Operating System for Open Science. Researching Human-AI Alignment, Decentralized Science (DeSci), and Distributed Systems.

projects.title: tagore-virtual-ecosystem
projects.description: A unified platform enabling seamless collaboration, crowdfunding, and version control for scientific research. Designed to replace fragmented tools like email and drive with a GitHub-like workflow for academics.

projects.title: llm-hallucination-mitigation
projects.description: Investigating Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) techniques to reduce hallucination rates in medical diagnosis models. Benchmarking Llama-3 against GPT-4 on the MedQA dataset.

projects.title: decentralized-peer-review-protocol
projects.description: A blockchain-based protocol for transparent, incentivized peer review. Utilizing smart contracts to reward reviewers with reputation tokens, eliminating the bias of traditional gatekeeping.

projects.title: vertical-farming-iot-controller
projects.description: Open-source firmware for ESP32 microcontrollers to automate nutrient delivery and light cycles in high-density urban hydroponic systems. Optimized for low-power consumption.

projects.title: neural-interface-signal-processing
projects.description: Signal processing algorithms for non-invasive Brain-Computer Interfaces (BCI). Filtering noise from EEG data to improve motor imagery classification accuracy for prosthetic control.

projects.title: quantum-resistant-auth-service
projects.description: A prototype authentication microservice implementing lattice-based cryptography (Kyber) to secure user data against future quantum computing attacks.
